intro: SBI has announced Circle-Based Officer recruitment with 2273 vacancies across India.
jobDescription: SBI is hiring Circle-Based Officers for branch and banking operations. Candidates should review eligibility, local language requirements, and category-wise vacancy details in the official notice.
responsibilities: Review the official notification and role expectations carefully.
Prepare resume and required documents before applying.
Complete application within deadline and track further updates.
minQualifications: Any additional requirements mentioned in the official listing.
prefQualifications: Relevant project, internship, or domain exposure.
howToApply: Apply online through the official SBI registration portal before the deadline and keep required documents ready.
author: StudentTechProjects Team
imageAlt: SBI Circle-Based Officer Recruitment 2026 at State Bank of India (SBI)
